name: The Last Tale of Gods at War
name_original: The Last Tale of Gods at War
description:
It's a story about a conflict between Anubis and Ra - two mighty gods of Ancient Egypt.
They have a great power, they have armies and disciples. Who knows who will win this fight. 

It's an experimental hybrid of an AutoBattler/Chess and a Card Game, where gods fight in the skies (on the left side of the screen) and all their actions affect ordinary people on the ground (on the right side of the screen). 

You can help your sky units in battle, but it hurts your people on the ground. Defeat Anubis before your "earth army" dies.
